actions.streamNotAvailable: This is not available for download yet

settings.title: Video & subtitle settings
settings.description: Configure the appearance and format of the subtitles
settings.sizeDescription: Adjust the size of your subtitles
settings.outlineThicknessDescription: Adjust the thickness of your subtitles outline
settings.shadowDescription: Adjust the shadow of your subtitles
settings.yAxisAlignmentDescription: Adjust the y axis alignment of your subtitles
settings.arialDescription: Build your subtitles for the arial font family.
settings.timesNewRomanDescription: Build your subtitles for the times new roman font family.
settings.courierNewDescription: Build your subtitles for the courier new font family.
settings.originalDescription: Build your subtitles for the original aspect ratio.
settings.zoomed_916Description: Build your subtitles for the zoomed 9:16 aspect ratio.
settings.normal_916_with_bordersDescription: Build your subtitles for the normal 9:16 aspect ratio with borders.
settings.chunkNumberDescription: Number of parts for the video
settings.languageDescription: Select the language of the subtitles
settings.isResumeDescription: Generate a resume of the video
settings.autoDescription: Automatically detect the language of the video
settings.englishDescription: Build your subtitles for the english language
settings.frenchDescription: Build your subtitles for the french language

created.title: Created
created.description: Your project has been successfully created and initialized. The system is now ready to process your video file.

uploaded.title: Video uploaded
uploaded.description: Your file has been successfully uploaded to our servers. The file is now available for processing and all necessary validations have passed.

uploading.title: Uploading video
uploading.description: Your file is currently being transferred to our servers. Please wait while the upload completes. Do not close this window.

extracting_sound.title: Extracting audio
extracting_sound.description: We are extracting the audio track from your video file. This audio will be used to generate accurate subtitles for your content.

extracting_sound_completed.title: Audio extracted
extracting_sound_completed.description: Audio extraction completed successfully. The sound has been separated from the video and is ready for subtitle generation.

extracting_sound_failed.title: Audio extraction failed
extracting_sound_failed.description: We encountered an error while extracting audio from your video. Please verify your file format is supported and try again.

generating_subtitle.title: Generating subtitles
generating_subtitle.description: Our system is analyzing the audio and generating subtitles in SRT format. This process uses speech recognition to transcribe your content accurately.

generating_subtitle_completed.title: Subtitles generated
generating_subtitle_completed.description: Subtitle generation completed successfully. Your transcription is ready and has been saved in standard SRT format.

generating_subtitle_failed.title: Subtitles generation failed
generating_subtitle_failed.description: Subtitle generation encountered an error. This may be due to unclear audio, unsupported language, or technical issues. Please try again.

transforming_subtitle.title: Transforming subtitles
transforming_subtitle.description: We are converting and optimizing your subtitle file to the required format. This includes adjusting timing, formatting, and text encoding.

transforming_subtitle_completed.title: Subtitles transformed
transforming_subtitle_completed.description: Subtitle transformation completed. Your subtitles have been successfully converted and formatted according to your specifications.

transforming_subtitle_failed.title: Subtitles transformation failed
transforming_subtitle_failed.description: An error occurred during subtitle transformation. The subtitle file may be corrupted or in an incompatible format. Please check and retry.

resizing_video.title: Resizing video
resizing_video.description: Your video is being resized to match the target dimensions and aspect ratio. This process optimizes the video for your intended platform or use case.

resizing_video_completed.title: Video resized
resizing_video_completed.description: Video resizing completed successfully. Your video now has the correct dimensions and is optimized for playback on your target platform.

resizing_video_failed.title: Video resizing failed
resizing_video_failed.description: Video resizing failed due to an error. This could be caused by unsupported video codec, resolution issues, or insufficient resources. Please try again.

uploading_video.title: Uploading video
uploading_video.description: The processed video is being uploaded to its final destination. Please wait while the transfer completes. This may take a few moments depending on file size.

uploading_video_completed.title: Video uploaded
uploading_video_completed.description: Your processed video has been successfully uploaded and is now available at its destination. You can now share or publish your content.

uploading_video_failed.title: Video upload failed
uploading_video_failed.description: Video upload failed. This could be due to network issues, server problems, or insufficient storage space. Please check your connection and try again.

embedding_video.title: Embedding subtitles
embedding_video.description: We are embedding the generated subtitles directly into your video file. This creates a single file with burned-in captions for maximum compatibility.

embedding_video_completed.title: Subtitles embedded
embedding_video_completed.description: Subtitles have been successfully embedded into your video. The captions are now permanently part of the video and will display on any player.

embedding_video_failed.title: Subtitles embedding failed
embedding_video_failed.description: Subtitle embedding failed. This may be due to video codec incompatibility or processing errors. Please verify your video format and try again.

resuming.title: Generating video resume
resuming.description: We are creating a resume summary for your video, highlighting the main points and content in a concise format.

resuming_completed.title: Video resume generated
resuming_completed.description: Video resume generation completed successfully. The summary has been created and is now ready for your review.

resuming_failed.title: Video resume generation failed
resuming_failed.description: Video resume generation failed. This may be due to technical issues or insufficient resources. Please check your system and try again.

chunking_video.title: Chunking video
chunking_video.description: Your video is being split into smaller segments or chunks. This is useful for creating clips, optimizing streaming, or preparing content for social media.

chunking_video_completed.title: Video chunked
chunking_video_completed.description: Video chunking completed successfully. Your video has been divided into multiple segments that are ready for individual use or distribution.

chunking_video_failed.title: Video chunking failed
chunking_video_failed.description: An error occurred while splitting the video into chunks. This could be due to file corruption, timing issues, or technical problems. Please retry.

completed.title: Done
completed.description: All processing steps have been completed successfully! Your video is ready and all requested operations have been applied. You can now download or use your content.

failed.title: Failed
failed.description: The processing workflow encountered a critical error and could not complete. Please review the error details, verify your input file, and try again.

deleted.title: Deleted
deleted.description: The selected item has been permanently removed from the system. All associated files and data have been deleted and cannot be recovered.

upload_failed.title: Upload failed
upload_failed.description: File upload failed before completion. This may be caused by network interruption, file size limits, or unsupported file format. Please check and retry.

in_process.title: In Process
in_process.description: The processing workflow is currently in progress. Please wait while the system completes the necessary operations.
